name: Steamed Hams
one_liner: A scene from The Simpsons that became a massive source of video remixes and linguistic deconstruction.
meaning: A testament to the internet's ability to obsess over a specific, awkward 90s television moment.
remix_rules: Replacing every 'ham' with a different word
example_lines: At this time of year? Steamed hams in the kitchen
Patented Skinner burgers, old family recipe
